Class CreateChannelCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.manager.channel.CreateChannelCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloneChannelCommand, UpdateChannelCommand

    public class CreateChannelCommand
extends java.lang.Object
    CreateChannelCommand - command to create a new channel.

      • validateChannel

        protected void validateChannel(ChannelArch ca,
                   ChecksumType ct)

      • create

        public Channel create()
               throws InvalidChannelLabelException,
                      InvalidChannelNameException,
                      InvalidParentChannelException
        Creates the Channel based on the parameters that were set.
        Returns:
        the newly created Channel
        Throws:
        InvalidChannelLabelException - thrown if label is in use or invalid.
        InvalidChannelNameException - throw if name is in use or invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if label, name or user are null.
        InvalidParentChannelException - thrown if parent label is not a valid base channel.

      • setParentChannel

        protected void setParentChannel(Channel affected,
                    User usr,
                    java.lang.String lbl,
                    java.lang.Long pid)
        sets the parent channel of the given affected channel if pLabel or pid is given. pLabel is preferred if both are given. If both pLabel and pid are null or if no channel is found for the given label or pid, the affected channel is unchanged.
        Parameters:
        affected - The Channel to receive a new parent, if one is found.
        usr - The usr
        lbl - The parent Channel label, can be null.
        pid - The parent Channel id, can be null.

      • verifyRequiredParameters

        protected void verifyRequiredParameters()
        Verifies that the required parameters are not null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if label, name, user or summary are null.
